movie.title: The Avengers
movie.plot: When an unexpected enemy emerges and threatens global safety and security, Nick Fury, director of the international peacekeeping agency known as S.H.I.E.L.D., finds himself in need of a team to pull the world back from the brink of disaster. Spanning the globe, a daring recruitment effort begins!
movie.awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 38 wins & 79 nominations.
